item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：申银万国考虑迁往中国，为香港上市铺平道路
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引消息人士的话报道，快速时尚零售商Shein集团考虑将总部迁回中国，以争取北京当局批准其在香港上市的计划。【原文：Fast-fashion retailer Shein Group has considered relocating its headquarters back to China in an effort to gain Beijing authorities' approval for its planned Hong Kong IPO, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing sources.】

item.title: 美国间谍头目加巴德称英国同意放弃对苹果公司的 "后门 "授权
item.description: 美国国家情报局局长图尔西-加巴德（Tulsi Gabbard）周一表示，英国已同意放弃要求 iPhone 制造商苹果公司提供 "后门 "的要求，因为 "后门 "可以访问美国公民受保护的加密数据。【原文：U.S. Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard said on Monday the UK had agreed to drop its mandate for iPhone maker Apple to provide a "back door" that would have enabled access to the protected encrypted data of American citizens.】

item.title: 美联储会议前亚洲股市下跌；欧洲股市因乌克兰峰会希望而上涨
item.description: 周二，在央行行长关键会议召开之前，亚洲股市和油价走低，交易商也在评估有望结束俄罗斯和乌克兰敌对状态的外交信号。【原文：Stocks in Asia and oil prices edged lower on Tuesday before a key meeting of central bankers and as traders evaluated promising diplomatic signals toward ending hostilities between Russia and Ukraine.】

item.title: 市场为乌克兰峰会做好准备，美元等待时机
item.description: 美元兑主要货币周二持稳，因为全球市场在等待白宫与欧洲国家峰会的结果，这次峰会可能决定乌克兰战争的下一阶段。美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一对乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）表示，在任何结束与俄罗斯战争的协议中，美国都将帮助保障乌克兰的安全，此后地缘政治事件成为焦点，美元指数上涨0.31%，报98.122点。【原文：The U.S. dollar held steady against its major peers on Tuesday as global markets awaited the outcome of a White House summit with European nations that could determine the next phase of the war in Ukraine. The dollar index rose 0.31% to 98.122 with geopolitical events taking centre stage, after U.S. President Donald Trump told President Volodymyr Zelenskiy on Monday that the United States would help guarantee Ukraine's security in any deal to end the war with Russia.】

item.title: 降息提振澳大利亚 8 月消费者信心
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，由于今年第三次降息提振了财政和经济前景，8月份衡量澳大利亚消费者情绪的一项指标大幅改善。【原文：A measure of Australian consumer sentiment improved sharply in August as the third cut in interest rates this year bolstered the outlook for finances and the economy, a survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴西质疑美国贸易调查的合法性，敦促开展对话
item.description: 周一，巴西提交了对美国贸易调查的正式回应，拒绝接受指控，同时对调查本身的合法性提出质疑。【原文：Brazil submitted its formal response to a U.S. trade investigation on Monday, rejecting the allegations while challenging the legitimacy of the probe itself.】

item.title: 市场思考潜在的俄乌和谈，石油走低
item.description: 油价在周二的亚洲早盘交易中下滑，原因是市场参与者考虑到俄罗斯、乌克兰和美国计划举行三方会谈以结束乌克兰战争，这可能导致结束对俄罗斯原油的制裁。【原文：Oil prices slipped in early Asian trade on Tuesday as market participants contemplated planned three-way talks among Russia, Ukraine and the U.S. to end the war in Ukraine, which could lead to an end to sanctions on Russian crude.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，加航与罢工工会将于周一晚进行讨论
item.description: 一位熟悉此事的消息人士称，加拿大航空公司及其代表 10,000 名空乘人员的工会将于周一晚与一名调解员进行讨论。【原文：Air Canada and its union representing 10,000 flight attendants are holding discussions on Monday night with a mediator, a source familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 特斯拉在中国推出 Model Y L，售价约 4.72 万美元起
item.description: 特斯拉公司在中国社交媒体平台微博上发布消息称，该公司已在中国推出 Model Y L，起售价为 339,000 元人民币（约合 47,184 美元）。【原文：Tesla Inc has launched its Model Y L in China with a starting price of 339,000 yuan ($47,184), according to its post on Chinese social media platform Weibo.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 TPG 电信公司 iiNet 系统发生网络事件
item.description: 澳大利亚第二大互联网服务提供商 TPG Telecom 周二表示，公司正在调查一起网络事件，在该事件中，一个身份不明的第三方未经授权访问了其 iiNet 系统下的订单管理系统。【原文：Australia's No. 2 internet provider TPG Telecom said on Tuesday it is investigating a cyber incident where an unknown third party secured unauthorized access to an order management system under its iiNet system.】

item.title: 巴西竞争管理机构调查大豆出口商
item.description: 据路透社报道，巴西竞争管理局（CADE）总监督亚历山大-巴雷托-德索萨（Alexandre Barreto de Souza）周一签署了一项决定，命令巴西大豆贸易商结束一项名为 "大豆暂停 "的计划，否则将面临巨额罚款。【原文：A unit of Brazilian competition authority CADE has ordered soybean traders in Brazil to end a program called "Soy Moratorium" or face hefty fines, according to a decision signed by CADE's General Superintendent Alexandre Barreto de Souza on Monday and seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 安全漏洞通知网站称安联人寿遭黑客攻击，110 万客户受到影响
item.description: 据外泄通报网站 Have I Been Pwned 周一报道，美国保险公司安联人寿 7 月底遭受的网络攻击泄露了 110 万客户的个人数据。【原文：A cyberattack at U.S. insurance firm Allianz Life in late July compromised the personal data of 1.1 million customers, according to breach notification site Have I Been Pwned on Monday.】

item.title: 必和必拓以高达 4.65 亿美元的价格向 CoreX 出售巴西铜矿资产
item.description: 全球矿业公司必和必拓（BHP）周一在发布财报时表示，已同意以高达 4.65 亿美元的价格将巴西的铜资产出售给 CoreX Holding 公司。【原文：Global miner BHP has agreed to sell copper assets in Brazil to CoreX Holding for up to $465 million, it reported alongside its earnings on Monday.】

item.title: 软银将向英特尔投资 20 亿美元
item.description: 软银集团周一签署了一项协议，将向英特尔普通股投资 20 亿美元。【原文：SoftBank Group on Monday signed an agreement to make a $2 billion investment in Intel's common stock.】

item.title: 钢铁制造商安赛乐米塔尔报告墨西哥工厂发生爆炸，无人受伤
item.description: 钢铁制造商安赛乐米塔尔位于墨西哥太平洋小镇拉扎罗-卡德纳斯（Lazaro Cardenas）的工厂周一发生强烈爆炸。【原文：A strong explosion rocked steelmaker ArcelorMittal's facilities in the Pacific town of Lazaro Cardenas in Mexico on Monday, the firm said.】

item.title: 因铁矿石价格下跌，必和必拓实现五年来最小盈利
item.description: 本周二，必和必拓集团（BHP Group）公布了其五年来最小的年度基本利润，原因是其最主要的赚钱商品铁矿石的价格仍然受到供过于求和中国需求放缓的压力。【原文：BHP Group reported its smallest annual underlying profit in five years on Tuesday, as prices of its top money-making commodity, iron ore, remained under pressure due to oversupply concerns and slowing China demand.】

item.title: 部长表示，秘鲁希望通过减税吸引投资并维持农业出口繁荣
item.description: 秘鲁农业部长周一告诉路透社，秘鲁希望通过大幅降低大型出口公司的所得税来增加农业投资。【原文：Peru hopes to increase agricultural investment with a significant reduction in income tax for large export companies, the sector's minister told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 博士伦董事会成员在伊坎协议结束后辞职
item.description: 博士伦公司周一表示，在终止与亿万富翁卡尔-伊坎及其部分关联公司的协议后，布雷特-伊坎和加里-胡已辞去公司董事会职务。【原文：Bausch + Lomb said on Monday Brett Icahn and Gary Hu have resigned from its board of directors after the termination of the agreement with billionaire Carl Icahn and some of his affiliates.】

item.title: 迪迪 99 在巴西法院起诉中国竞争对手基塔公司
item.description: 据路透社看到的法庭文件显示，中国打车公司滴滴出行（DiDi Global）的巴西子公司99周一向圣保罗一家法院起诉中国竞争对手吉塔公司（Keeta）涉嫌商标侵权和不正当竞争。【原文：A Brazilian subsidiary of China's ride-hailing company DiDi Global , called 99, filed a lawsuit on Monday against Chinese rival Keeta before a Sao Paulo court for alleged trademark infringement and unfair competition, according to court documents seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 消息人士称，巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）倾向于用玉米而非甘蔗生产乙醇，可能会将 Raizen 排除在外
item.description: 巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）三位熟悉内情的消息人士援引初步评估结果称，巴西国家石油公司正倾向于将玉米作为再次进军乙醇领域的原料，从而有可能将甘蔗和陷入困境的蔗糖生产商 Raizen 甩在一边。【原文：Brazil's Petrobras is leaning toward corn as the raw material for a renewed foray into ethanol, potentially sidelining sugarcane and beleaguered sugar producer Raizen , three Petrobras sources familiar with the matter said, citing preliminary evaluations.】

item.title: Palo Alto 的预测预示着人工智能将推动网络安全工具的发展
item.description: Palo Alto Networks 公司周一预测，2026 财年的收入和利润将高于华尔街预期，该公司押注于人工智能驱动的网络安全解决方案需求的增长，从而使其股价在延时交易中上涨了近 5%。【原文：Palo Alto Networks forecast fiscal 2026 revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates on Monday, betting on growing demand for its artificial intelligence-powered cybersecurity solutions, sending its shares up nearly 5% in extended trading.】

item.title: 交易日 周一交易清淡，关注特朗普峰会
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 区块链贷款机构 Figure Technology 公开提交美国 IPO 申请
item.description: 区块链贷款公司 Figure Technology Solutions 周一公布了其在美国首次公开募股的文件。【原文：Blockchain lender Figure Technology Solutions on Monday made public its paperwork for an initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 独家报道Arm 聘请亚马逊人工智能芯片总监协助内部工作
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，Arm 控股公司已聘请亚马逊公司前人工智能芯片总监拉米-辛诺（Rami Sinno），以加强其开发自己的完整芯片的计划。【原文：Arm Holdings has hired former Amazon.com artificial intelligence chip director Rami Sinno to bolster its plans to develop its own complete chips, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Vanguard 计划推出首批主动选股 ETF
item.description: 根据周一向监管机构提交的文件，被动投资管理领军企业先锋集团（Vanguard）计划在今年推出首批主动管理型美国股票交易所交易基金。【原文：Passive-investment management leader Vanguard plans to launch its first actively managed U.S. stock exchange-traded funds this year, according to filings with regulators on Monday.】

item.title: 加航首席执行官称航空公司对非法工会罢工感到 "惊讶
item.description: 加拿大航空公司首席执行官迈克-卢梭（Mike Rousseau）周一表示，该公司对空乘人员工会无视加拿大劳资关系委员会（Canada Industrial Relations Board）的决定感到 "惊讶"。【原文：Air Canada Chief Executive Mike Rousseau said on Monday that the airline was "amazed" by the decision of its flight attendants' union to defy the Canada Industrial Relations Board, which has declared the union's strike unlawful.】

item.title: 星巴克表示今年将为北美地区所有受薪员工加薪 2
item.description: 星巴克周一向路透社透露，该公司今年将为北美地区的所有受薪员工小幅加薪 2%，作为首席执行官布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）扭亏为盈工作的一部分，这家咖啡连锁店正努力控制成本。【原文：Starbucks will provide a modest 2% hike to all salaried employees in North America this year, the company told Reuters on Monday, as the coffee chain tries to keep a tight lid on costs as part of CEO Brian Niccol's turnaround efforts.】

item.title: 消息人士称 Thoma Bravo 接近达成收购软件公司 Dayforce 的交易
item.description: 私募股权公司 Thoma Bravo 接近达成收购人力资源软件公司 Dayforce 的交易，一位熟悉此事的消息人士周一告诉路透社。【原文：Private equity firm Thoma Bravo is nearing a deal to acquire HR software company Dayforce , a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 特拉华州最高法院裁定，CVS 不能获得 AIG 和 Chubb 的阿片类药物保险
item.description: 特拉华州最高法院周一裁定，CVS Health 因其在美国阿片类药物危机中扮演的角色而遭到数千起诉讼，无权获得包括 AIG 和 Chubb 在内的保险公司的承保。【原文：CVS Health is not entitled to coverage from insurers, including AIG and Chubb , against thousands of lawsuits over its role in the nation's opioid crisis, Delaware's highest court ruled on Monday.】

item.title: Nu Holdings 首席执行官贝莱斯出售 3,300 万股公司股票
item.description: 经营巴西数字贷款公司 Nubank 的 Nu 控股公司在周一的一份声明中说，公司首席执行官大卫-贝莱斯（David Velez）通过 Rua 加利福尼亚有限公司出售了公司 3300 万股 A 类股。【原文：Nu Holdings , which runs Brazilian digital lender Nubank, said in a statement on Monday its Chief Executive Officer David Velez sold 33 million class A shares of the company through Rua California Ltd.】
